title: POINT_CAM_AT_PED_BONE
content:
0x68B2B5F33BA63C410x09F47049// PointCamAtPedBone
void POINT_CAM_AT_PED_BONE(Cam cam, Ped ped, int boneIndex, float x, float y, float z, BOOL p6);Parameters p0-p5 seems correct. The bool p6 is unknown, but through every X360 script it's always 1. Please correct p0-p5 if any prove to be wrong.
codeBlocks:
// PointCamAtPedBone
void POINT_CAM_AT_PED_BONE(Cam cam, Ped ped, int boneIndex, float x, float y, float z, BOOL p6);
Parameters p0-p5 seems correct. The bool p6 is unknown, but through every X360 script it's always 1. Please correct p0-p5 if any prove to be wrong.

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for POINT_CAM_AT_PED_BONE
PointCamAtPedBone(0, ped, 0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, false)
